blog.title: Running an image generator
blog.description: I build my own AI image generator using open-source models and European hosting. See how to integrate Stable Diffusion into static websites with full privacy and cost control.

prevBlog.title: Can I have interactive python pages ?
prevBlog.description: I explore the future of interactive content with Python running directly in browsers. Tools like Pyodide and JupyterLite enable portable, installation-free data science.

nextBlog.title: A decentral support button
nextBlog.description: I build a decentralized support button using smart contracts for direct content monetization. Learn how blockchain enables transparent micro-payments without platform intermediaries.
